***** Hindi[edit] *****
**** Etymology[edit] ****
Borrowed from Classical_Persian کاسه‎ (kāsa).
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * (Delhi Hindi) IPA(key): /kɑː.sɑː/, [käː.s̪äː]
**** Noun[edit] ****
कासा • (kāsā) m (Urdu spelling کاسه‎)
   1. bowl, cup, goblet
   2. (specifically) alms-bowl, begging-bowl
*** Declension[edit] ***
Declension of कासा (masc ā-stem)
                                    singular plural
                           direct   कासा     कासे
                                    kāsā     kāse
                           oblique  कासे     कासों
                                    kāse     kāsõ
                           vocative कासे     कासो
                                    kāse     kāso
***** Newar[edit] *****
**** Pronunciation[edit] ****
    * IPA(key): [kasa]
**** Noun[edit] ****
कासा • (kāsā) ? (Newa Spelling 𑐎𑐵𑐳𑐵)
   1. sport, game
